name: Roasted Pepper And Onion Vinaigrette
description: A fine counterpoint to grilled lamb chops or chicken, as well as salads made with full-bodied fish, like salmon or tuna.
keywords: raw, red pepper, red pepper juice, yogurt
recipeIngredient: 1/2 roasted red pepper, peeled, stemmed, seeded, deribbed and coarsely chopped
3 tablespoons finely chopped Bermuda or other sweet onion

recipeInstructions.text: Place the yogurt and the roasted pepper in a food processor and process until smooth. Add the onion, red pepper juice, lemon juice, salt and pepper and process for 10 seconds.
